item.description: <p>Witnesses have reported fighters going house-to-house, killing civilians and committing sexual assaults.</p>

item.title: Western Australian woman sentenced to decade behind bars for child abuse offences
item.description: <p>T﻿he 24-year-old woman will be eligible for parole after serving eight years.</p>

item.title: China's Xi in the limelight at Pacific summit with Trump conspicuous by his absence
item.description: <p>The US president flew out of South Korea Thursday, choosing to skip the annual summit of the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation.</p>

item.title: Two federal judges require Trump administration to use emergency funds to partially cover food stamp benefits
item.description: <p>The Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program, or SNAP, costs between $12.2 billion and $13.8 billion a month, so the judges&#x27; orders will not cover all of the needed payments for November.</p>

item.title: 'Threat to Australia's national security': WA brothers front court over illicit tobacco seizure allegedly link
item.description: <p>The Australian Federal Police (AFP) uncovered more than five tonnes of illicit tobacco products they say are linked to a national organised crime syndicate.</p>

item.title: Beers recalled over fears cans could 'burst' and cause injury
item.description: <p>A popular Aussie beer has been recalled over fears cans could burst and cause injury.</p>

item.title: Multiple people have been arrested in Michigan in a Halloween weekend attack plot, FBI director says
item.description: <p>Multiple people who had been allegedly plotting a violent attack over the Halloween weekend were arrested on Friday in Michigan, USA FBI Director Kash Patel said in a social media post.</p>

item.title: Melbourne teen injured in street fight as families celebrate Halloween
item.description: <p>A 14-year-old boy has been injured in a fight that erupted as families celebrated Halloween on a residential street in Melbourne&#x27;s west.</p>

item.title: Dramatic rescue of rock climber after getting tangled in ropes 10 metres from the ground
item.description: <p>Emergency services were called to the Onkaparinga River National Park around 12.30pm when a man became tangled in his climbing ropes around 10 metres from the ground.</p>

item.title: 'Morons': Flares thrown into crowd at first Oasis gig in Melbourne
item.description: <p>O﻿asis singer Liam Gallagher has called out a fan who threw flares at the British band&#x27;s first concert in Australia.</p>

item.title: Man arrested after woman found dead in Hunter Valley home
item.description: <p>Officers say a young child raised the alarm after running 400 metres to flag down passersby following the alleged attack.﻿</p>

item.title: Teenager dies after electric dirt bike crash on the Gold Coast
item.description: <p>Police said the 15-year-old rider hit a raised pedestrian walkway before striking two poles, the impact throwing him 10 metres.</p>

item.title: Power cut to hundreds as severe storm pummels Queensland's south-east coast
item.description: <p>A dangerous &#x27;super cell&#x27; storm has struck southeastern Queensland bringing large hail, lightning and cutting power to hundreds.</p>

item.title: Woman charged with murder over the death of an eight-month-old baby south of Perth
item.description: <p>The eight-month-old&#x27;s body was found by police and paramedics at a home about 40km south of Perth with what&#x27;s believed to be stab wounds.</p>

item.title: Halloween house party explodes into chaos in Perth after hundreds gatecrash gathering
item.description: <p>An out-of-control Halloween party in Perth&#x27;s south-east was broken up by police after hundreds of teenagers turned up.</p>
